Deadliest.Catch.S08E09.HDTV.x264-KILLERS
Date: 06/06/2012

It's winter in Dutch Harbor and the fleet prepares to hunt Opilio crab.

The season looks promising with the quota up and the price high, but tensions rise before the lines are thrown as one deckhand quits, two brothers fight and one goes overboard.
